profile.description: Specialized in software development with extensive experience in various technologies. I stand out for my analytical skills, quick adaptation to new technologies, and focus on creative problem-solving. I work effectively under pressure, manage my time efficiently, and promote teamwork.

first-job.title: FontVenta
first-job.description:
At FontVenta, I actively participated in the development and maintenance of back-end web applications designed to manage intranet pages. I used technologies like .Net and Visual Basic to create robust solutions that improved operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.
I closely collaborated with the front-end team to ensure seamless integration and worked with SQL Server Management Studio to manage complex databases. Additionally, I implemented continuous improvements and solved technical problems, ensuring optimal performance.

GymBros-Zone.title: GymBros Zone
GymBros-Zone.description:
GymBros Zone is an innovative social network focused on the gym and fitness world, created to connect exercise enthusiasts and promote a healthy lifestyle.
In GymBros Zone, users can share experiences, exchange knowledge, and achieve their goals.

PetPalace.title: PetPalace
PetPalace.description:
PetPalace is a web adoption platform where you can explore various pets looking for a home.
Once registered, you can view each animal's profile and apply filters to search according to your preferences. Each profile includes a contact number to facilitate adoption.

DevCode.title: DevCode
DevCode.description:
DevCode is a forum dedicated to programmers, designed to enhance interaction and knowledge exchange.
In DevCode, users can post their experiences, solve doubts, and actively collaborate on various programming-related topics.

first-title.title: Higher Technician in Web Application Development

first-skill.title: Analytical Skills
first-skill.description: Logical and analytical thinking, with a high capacity to solve complex problems and make decisions.

second-skill.title: Time Management
second-skill.description: Efficient in prioritizing tasks and delivering projects under pressure, ensuring deadlines are met.

third-skill.title: Fast Learning
third-skill.description: Ability to quickly adapt to new technologies and environments, applying what I've learned immediately in projects.

fourth-skill.title: Problem Solving
fourth-skill.description: Creative and structured approach to overcoming technical challenges and optimizing processes, achieving innovative solutions.

fifth-skill.title: Interpersonal Skills
fifth-skill.description: Teamwork, collaborative leadership, and active listening, fostering a positive and productive work environment.
